author: Reuters Editorial
title: S.Korean prosecutors raid Korean Air headquarters - Yonhap
text:
SEOUL, May 31 (Reuters) - South Korean prosecutors raided Korean Air Lines’ headquarters over suspected embezzlement and breach of trust by members of its owning family, Yonhap News Agency reported on Thursday.
A Korean Air spokesman said an investigative team was at the headquarters. A prosecution spokesman could not be immediately reached for comment.
Reporting by Haejin Choi; Editing by Stephen Coates
